post.body: So glad that's taking effect BEFORE my birthday :)
Are you home now?
haha. I said I already had plans.
and yet you called me Debbie downer
feeling thankful. Hours are cut but only for a wk. "A Team Members" Will be "Store hopping" this month due to economy "B Team" are laid off
is SO excited to go to the zoo with Erin, Riley, and Hailee! Riley requested I go along :)
oh the joys of working with a bunch of women...haha- if men only knew ;)
Thank you sister and Brother!! You saved a girl from a very bad morning! Traveled all the way to Tigard to shovel me out :) Merry Christmas!
Totals from CR XMAS 08'... Hours:3 Tips:$50 Phone Numbers received:2 And the best-Getting asked on a date FOR after work TODAY!:2 No joke!
Merry Christmas! Come see me at work!!
Just got called into work...hey- at least I'm getting some hours..
a few trees down around the apt...but still doing fine! The Amtrak however--- is still not running....we'll try again tomorrow
is having flashbacks to ice storm...made it home safely but definitely turning down the Opening "offer" for work tomorrow...not worth it!
"So what do you do for a living?" Customer: Oh I babysit robots...got a few at Intel that weren't nursed long enough and now are teething.
hmm...I know I'm tough on my hands-but am I tough on my tires too? Not even 24 hrs and already broke a link off my chains! drivin w/ just 1!
is wanting to ask her mommy to mail down her old sled...it's possible right?
Got chains on her car- and- made it up her hill with ease! Ready to go and wanting to play in the snow...anyone down?
Got stuck in traffic on my way to first final and ran out of time to finish it! GREAT way to start my Final TRIO of a day! :(
wants a good luck charm for Christmas- I seem to have misplaced mine!
IS officially broke for the next 5 days! SWEET! thank you flaky roommate!
